3.	Please append parts 1 and 2
4.	Please use professional judgement in joining the videos
a.	I think you want to drop the last 13 seconds of Part 1
b.	Part II should start with the “Chat GPT” slide.
5.	I did not record something important when I did Part I the second time (see #6)
6.	Please insert a card around 15:34 of Part I to read “John forgot to mention that he used Chat GPT to summarize the article on Mastercard and Cannabis Purchases.”
7.	Use your judgement on how long this needs to be displayed.
Thank you.

jobs.title: Add an Islamic daily prayer table for multiple UK cities in wordpress elementor from CSV files
jobs.description:
We have the site eternalaid (dot) com 

We want to build something like this page for cities in the UK.

https://www.islamic-relief (dot) org.uk/resources/prayer-timetables/manchester/

There are files we have for prayer times.

Here is what we need:

The project is sensitive and complex since:

1- There are many cities.

2- Each cities has times estimated from many institutions. For example, Blackburn has 6 institutions.

3- Each instituion has 2 school of thoughts.

4- Each school of thoughts have 365 days of timing, a total of 43,800 data, but we will only have to show the current date's timing.

5- you will also have to make sure that, we won't have to touch any coding and instead, we will just replace the files that have timing in the server. For example, when March 2024 passes, we will just replace the 2025's timing.

How do you do this. 

For a specific cities i.e. Blackburn, you would have two drop downs.

a) The institutions 
b) The school of thoughts 

When a person picks any one of these, you can change the prayer times displayed.  One institution and one School of thought can be default.

We would want one template that looks exactly the same for all the pages.  

1) Hero graphic with text 
2) Breadcrumb
3) Text
4) Nice designed quote
5) FAQ's 
6) Footer section with links to other popular cities times. 

We should be able to control the content on this template. Adjusting one should adjust all pages

jobs.title: Data Entry Copy Paste Job
jobs.description:
Job Title: Data Entry Specialist

Job Summary:
Our company is seeking a meticulous and efficient Data Entry Specialist to join our team. The primary responsibility of this role is to accurately and promptly input data from diverse sources into our database. The ideal candidate should possess exceptional attention to detail, proficiency in typing, and a strong commitment to maintaining data integrity. Basic computer knowledge, precision, and effective time management skills are crucial for success in this position.

Key Responsibilities:
- Perform data entry tasks by efficiently copying and pasting information from various sources into our database.
- Maintain data integrity by ensuring the accuracy and completeness of entered information.
- Collaborate with team members to identify and resolve any discrepancies or errors in the data.
- Adhere to established data entry protocols and guidelines to ensure consistency and accuracy.
- Work diligently to meet deadlines and achieve daily/weekly data entry targets.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Data Entry Specialist or similar role.
- Proficient typing skills with a high level of accuracy and speed.
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering error-free work.
- Solid understanding of basic computer applications and data management systems.
- Excellent time management skills to effectively prioritize and complete tasks within deadlines.

If you are a detail-oriented individual with a passion for accuracy and efficiency, and if you thrive in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and contribute to our mission of maintaining high-quality data within our organization.

jobs.title: NCLEX Review RN/PN Curriculum Development Expert
jobs.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced professional to assist in the development of a comprehensive NCLEX Review curriculum. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in nursing education, curriculum design, and expertise in NCLEX test preparation. This project requires creating engaging and effective study materials that align with the latest NCLEX test plan and incorporate evidence-based teaching methodologies.

Responsibilities:
Conduct a thorough analysis of the NCLEX test plan and identify key content areas, topics, and question formats.
Develop a detailed outline and timeline for the NCLEX curriculum, including lesson plans, learning objectives, and assessment strategies.
Create engaging and interactive study materials such as presentations, video lectures, quizzes, practice exams, and case studies.
Incorporate critical thinking exercises and clinical scenarios to enhance students' problem-solving skills.
Review and update existing materials as needed to ensure accuracy and relevance to current NCLEX requirements.
Provide ongoing support and guidance throughout the project duration, addressing any questions or concerns promptly.

Requirements:
Proven experience in nursing education and curriculum development, specifically in NCLEX preparation.
In-depth knowledge of the NCLEX test plan, test-taking strategies, and item writing guidelines.Strong understanding of evidence-based teaching practices and adult learning principles.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to convey complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.
Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.
Relevant educational qualifications in nursing or a related field are preferred.
To apply, please submit the following:

Updated resume or CV highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.
A brief cover letter outlining your approach to NCLEX curriculum development and your teaching philosophy.
Samples of previous NCLEX curriculum materials or related educational content.
Your proposed hourly rate or project-based fee for completing the curriculum development.

We look forward to collaborating with a dedicated professional who can help us provide the best NCLEX preparation resources to aspiring nurses. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.

jobs.title: Admin Panel for Next.js
jobs.description:
I'm looking for someone to fix and finish my admin panel for my Next.js application.

I have a booking platform application created using Next.js, with sqlite3 as the database. In it, there are the following tables:

Users, Events, EventsMeta, EventsMetaData, Tiers, TiersIncentive, Registrations

I had setup each page to have its own CRUD operations (e.g. Users had its own page, Events had its own page, EventsMeta had its own page, etc), but I realized by having them disjoint it is impossible to manager, especially due to complex foreign key operations (e.g. EventsMetaData references EventsMeta which references Events, TiersIncentive references Tiers which references Events).

So, I'm looking for someone to build an admin panel with 3 pages:
1. Users Management
2. Events Management (includes [EventsMeta, EventsMetaData], [Tiers, TiersIncentive])
3. Registrations Management

See attachments for Current (what I have now), and Target 1/2 (what I want to achieve).

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer in Finance (AI+ML toolchain)
jobs.description:
Fully funded Investing/Trading newsletter is looking for a senior polyglot engineer that is passionate about finance and trading.  Key characteristics we desire: 

* Full-stack focus*: Uniquely balanced engineer that believes great UI experiences are just as important as scalable backend services.  

*Experience with data scraping*: A big part of our service relies on pulling together multiple disparate data sources from across the internet.  Some of this is web scraping and other pieces include API scraping. 

*Experience with modern ML toolchain*: Yes, we’re using GPT, langchain, and are striving for autonomous systems like AutoGPT.  If you don’t have experience here, you should bring a strong passion and ability to learn. 

*Experience with Charting/UI packages*: Ideally, you have experience with charting services like TradingView.  If not that, it would be great if you had experience with charting libraries like chart.js and d3.js.  

*Experience with Python*: We’re doing a lot of prototyping and data science work in python.  Experience here is a plus. 

*Experience constructing great visualizations*: Our newsletter is a PDF.  Ideally, you have experience constructing PDFs and creating excellent visualizations.  

The ideal candidate for this role really has a passion for the markets.  Do you like trading?  Do you follow US or global equities?  Do you like the idea of comparing key equities or detecting anomalies in the markets?  Have you dabbled in building your own automated trading systems?  If you have some of these characteristics, you could be perfect for this role.

The goal of your work is to display important information for the customers in an easy-to-consume manner. You will receive an ongoing flow of new projects - we are constantly launching new products and optimizing our existing product content. It will be close to a full-time job. We are hiring either one or several designers, depending on the availability of suitable applicants.

The job has a high potential of being full time if we find you to be a great fit.

The main KPI of the position is content conversion rate. We are looking for a person who is capable of creating well-converting designs. Previous experience in ecommerce design is highly appreciated.

jobs.title: Content Writer Luxury Travel - to write valuable blog articles - Test article for long-term collab
jobs.description:
Unveiling the World's Most Exquisite Destinations: Crafting Exceptional Content for Luxury Travel Enthusiasts"

Introduction:
Your mission is to create captivating and in-depth articles for Luxury Travelers. Through your words, we aim to inspire and guide luxury travelers in their quest for unforgettable experiences. Your articles will be SEO-optimized, while maintaining flexibility to ensure relevance and value for our readers. Additionally, we encourage you to conduct thorough research on best practices in luxury travel and incorporate testimonials for an enhanced reader experience.

REQUIREMENTS
- Conduct extensive research on the subject.
- Crafting Engaging and SEO-Optimized Content:
- Create captivating headlines and introductions to captivate readers' attention.
- Optimize the articles for SEO by employing relevant keywords, meta descriptions, and appropriate headings.
- Ensure that the content meets our high standards of quality, accuracy, and relevance.
- Tailor each article to our target audience of luxury travel enthusiasts, offering unique perspectives and insider tips.

This mission can lead to a long term collaboration.

AS A FIRST MISSION WE CHALLENGE YOU WITH WRITING AN ARTICLE NAMED: The Ultimate Guide to Chartering a Yacht: Experience Luxury on the High Seas"

Article Writing Guidelines:

1. Introduction:
   - Title: "The Ultimate Guide to Chartering a Yacht: Experience Luxury on the High Seas"
   - Introduce the topic and highlight the allure of chartering a yacht for a luxurious vacation.

2. Understanding the Cost:
   - Explain the key factors that influence the cost of chartering a yacht, such as yacht size, amenities, charter duration, and destination.
   - Provide a breakdown of the average cost range based on different yacht types and sizes.
   - Discuss additional expenses to consider, such as fuel, gratuities, and provisioning.

3. Choosing the Perfect Yacht Broker:
   - Title: "How to Select the Perfect Yacht Broker: Your Key to a Seamless Yacht Charter Experience"
   - Explain the importance of working with a reputable yacht broker to ensure a smooth and unforgettable experience.
   - Discuss the qualities to look for in a yacht broker, such as experience, knowledge of the industry, and personalized service.
   - Provide tips on how to research and vet potential yacht brokers before making a decision.

4. Destination Selection:
   - Explore popular yacht charter destinations around the world, such as the Mediterranean, the Caribbean, the South Pacific, and more.
   - Highlight the unique features and attractions of each destination, including stunning coastlines, secluded islands, and vibrant culture.
   - Discuss the factors to consider when selecting a destination, such as the time of year, weather conditions, and desired activities.

5. The Key Ingredients for a Memorable Yacht Charter:
   - Share insights on the essential features and amenities to look for in a luxury yacht, such as spacious cabins, on-board entertainment, water toys, and gourmet dining.
   - Discuss the importance of personalized itineraries and the flexibility to customize your charter experience.
   - Mention the significance of attentive crew members who can cater to your every need and provide exceptional service.

6. Choosing the Right Type of Yacht:
   - Explain the different types of yachts available for charter, such as motor yachts, sailing yachts, and catamarans.
   - Discuss the benefits and considerations of each type, including speed, stability, and the overall experience.
   - Provide guidance on selecting the most suitable yacht based on your preferences, group size, and desired activities.

7. Choice of Gas:
   - Discuss the different options for fueling the yacht, such as diesel or gasoline.
   - Explain the factors that may influence the choice of gas, such as the yacht's engine type, efficiency, and environmental considerations.
   - Highlight the importance of discussing fueling options with your yacht broker and captain to ensure a seamless experience.

8. Conclusion:
   - Summarize the key points discussed throughout the article.
   - Reiterate the importance of planning, research, and selecting the right professionals to make your yacht charter experience truly unforgettable.

jobs.title: Amazon Virtual Assistant Internship Paid
jobs.description:
Job Location: Office 477, Street 12, Raza Block, Iqbal Town, Lahore (Onsite)

Job Timing: 9AM - 5PM

Are you a self-driven and tech-savvy individual looking for a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in the world of e-commerce? Join us for a paid internship at Amazon as a Virtual Assistant Intern. This internship will immerse you in the dynamic world of Amazon operations, where you will work closely with our team as a virtual assistant. During the initial 3-month period, you will receive comprehensive training and mentorship to excel in your role. This internship may open doors to a strong position within our organization for candidates who demonstrate exceptional skills and potential.

Responsibilities:

1. Amazon Seller Support: Provide virtual assistance to Amazon sellers, assisting them with various aspects of their business, such as product listings, order management, and customer service.

2. Product Research: Conduct product research to identify potential opportunities and trends within the Amazon marketplace.

3. Listing Optimization: Assist in optimizing product listings, including keyword research, content enhancement, and image optimization.

4. Data Analysis: Analyze sales data and performance metrics to derive valuable insights and suggest improvements to sellers.

5. Customer Engagement: Engage with customers, addressing inquiries and resolving issues to enhance their shopping experience.

6. Market Trends Monitoring: Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to stay ahead in the e-commerce landscape.

Qualifications:

1. Tech-savvy: Proficient in using various e-commerce platforms, online tools, and Microsoft Office applications.

2. Customer-Centric Approach: Demonstrated interest in delivering exceptional customer service and experience.

3. Analytical Mindset: Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and draw meaningful conclusions.

4. Adaptability: Quick learner with a willingness to adapt to new technologies and industry changes.

5. Time Management: Ability to manage time effectively, prioritize tasks, and meet project deadlines.

6. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills for clear and concise interaction with sellers and customers.

Join us on this exciting journey into the world of e-commerce and virtual assistance. Apply now for the Amazon Virtual Assistant Internship and explore opportunities for growth.

jobs.title: Cruise Booking Specialist
jobs.description:
As a Cruise Booking Specialist, you will be responsible for assisting clients in planning and booking cruise vacations that meet their specific preferences and needs. Your role will involve providing exceptional customer service, expertise in cruise itineraries, and ensuring a seamless booking process from start to finish. You will collaborate with clients, and cruise line representatives to deliver personalized and memorable cruise experiences.
Key Responsibilities:
•	Customer Assistance: Interact with clients to understand their preferences, budget, and travel requirements. Offer expert advice on cruise destinations, itineraries, onboard amenities, and various cruise lines to help clients make informed decisions.
•	Booking Management: Handle the entire booking process, from initial inquiries to final reservations. Coordinate with clients and cruise line representatives to secure cabin availability, process payments, and confirm all booking details.
•	Itinerary Customization: Tailor cruise itineraries to match the interests and preferences of individual clients. Suggest and arrange shore excursions, onboard activities, dining reservations, and other personalized experiences.
•	Knowledge of Cruise Industry: Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the cruise industry, including new cruise ships, destinations, promotions, and special offers. Use this knowledge to provide up-to-date information to clients.
•	Problem Resolution: Address any issues or concerns raised by clients related to their bookings or travel experiences promptly and professionally. Work to find suitable solutions and ensure client satisfaction.
•	Sales and Revenue Targets: Achieve sales goals and revenue targets set by the company. Actively promote additional services, upgrades, and amenities to enhance the client's overall cruise experience.
•	Documentation and Follow-up: Maintain accurate records of bookings, client communications, and payments. Follow up with clients after their cruises to gather feedback and build strong customer relationships.
•	Team Collaboration: Collaborate with other cruise booking specialists and support staff to share knowledge, best practices, and contribute to the overall success of the team and the company.
Requirements:
•	Preferred experience in the cruise industry, particularly in cruise bookings, or related customer service roles.
•	In-depth knowledge of various cruise lines, ships, itineraries, and onboard amenities.
•	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build rapport with clients and address their needs effectively.
•	Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple bookings and inquiries simultaneously.
•	Proficiency in reservation and booking systems to process transactions accurately.
•	Problem-solving skills to resolve issues and ensure client satisfaction.
•	Flexibility to work irregular hours and handle urgent requests or emergencies.
•	Sales-oriented mindset with a track record of meeting or exceeding targets.
•	Passion for travel and a willingness to stay updated on industry trends and destinations.
Benefits:
●     Flexible schedule- Work whenever is best for you 
●     Perks and rewards
●     Excellent opportunities for personal and career development
●     Collaborative and supportive company culture
●     An opportunity to work with top vendors

jobs.title: Video Editor needed for YouTube Automation channel
jobs.description:
Hello everyone! We are a thriving YouTube Automation project in search of a highly skilled, motivated, and experienced video editor to join our awesome team.


We currently have multiple openings for individuals who possess expertise in editing videos tailored in Football niche.


Take inspiration from these successful channels: 


Mh1comps
Ashstudio7
Ninetyvirus

This is a unique opportunity for a long-term collaboration, starting with project-based assignments. There is also the potential for advancement to a full-time or retainer position, provided we find a great match. If you lack the necessary experience, we kindly request that you refrain from applying at this time

Ideal Candidate:
- Vast experience in Adobe Premiere Pro or any professional video editing software
- Must have common sense
- Must be a creative person


Start the proposal with the word “YTA”
 
If you don’t, we won’t consider picking you.
Make sure to attach a portfolio with previous work ONLY if it’s related to what we are asking.


Thank you and we are waiting for your proposals!

jobs.title: Virtual Assistant for Various Tasks
jobs.description:
We are looking for a virtual assistant to support us with various tasks. The ideal candidate must be self-motivated, organized, and detail-oriented. This position requires strong communication skills and the ability to work independently. The tasks will include, but not limited to:

-Administrative support
-Data entry
-Email and calendar management
-Online research
-Social media management

Skills required:
-Excellent verbal and written communication skills
-Proficiency in MS Office suite
-Organizational and time management skills
-Attention to detail
-Ability to work independently
-Familiarity with social media platforms

This is a small-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level virtual assistant to join our team.

It's important to have this completed in the next 3 days or so. The budget is small, and what I am offering in exchange it's a beautiful 5-star review if the job is done properly. If you want a review that can boost your profile, besides the money from the job, you must apply starting your cover letter with the word butterfly. You must say why you like butterflies.

jobs.title: Seeking Senior Brand Designer for Refining and Publishing Our studio Branding Projects

Please note that you won´t create any brand from scratch, as we will provide the brand elements like logos, colors, and typography. The freelancer's role will be to generate images that complement the projects and can be published through mockups and other means. Take a look at our current projects on behance.com/task
